answers.answer: Sounds like preeclampsia.... hope things get better for you.
Yep sounds like preeclampsia. You need to call for sure.

That sounds like preeclampsia. I'm being monitored for it too (and actually ended up in the er last night).If you can check your BP and if it's high call the doctor or just go straight to the hospital. Even if you can't check your BP, call the doctor anyways.Good luck!

question: hi mommy's I'm 36wks 5days pregnant today at my doc appt I had a bit of high blood pressure. Lately I've been having horrible headaches, seeing spots, dizzyness and a bit of nausea. They have me doing this 24 hour urine jug where I keep my urine and take it back tomorrow. I've been having horrible headaches all day today. Should I go to the ER or just wait it out. Help please and thank you!
title: Help!
